message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000.  What are your thoughts?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer.  While I understand your budget constraints, the value of this product is significant.  I could come down to $900,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects its true worth.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and while I understand the value of the product, I'm still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
